Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed occurrences across all cases
Percentage of variants in which SW-Checklist Completed appears
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that are immediately followed by SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed that occur after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed relative to SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Number of cases where SW-Checklist Completed is directly preceded by SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that lead to a final decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, or SW-EIC Minor Revision) within the same variant
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed in variants that eventually result in manuscript acceptance (e.g., ending with RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed occurring before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers or SW-Initial Reviewer Selection)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Ratio of SW-Checklist Completed to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Checklist Completed occurs only once per case
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed in high-performance variants (e.g., those with performance duration below the median)
Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that are part of the most frequent process variant
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases

Name: Number of SW-Checklist Completed events that occur without any preceding checklist reminder activities (e.g., SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days or SW-Checklist Completion now due)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days' does not occur
